Since I posted him leaving a day or 2 ago SS arrives at the base, 
hovers 50 miles away from it, senses this is where fate has brought 
him and sends out a message that he wants to challenge Blight in 
mortal combat.

OOC: Although I have enough plans for him to have him run like a 
scared chicken. And since his dragon mode has jets could he go into 
space?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:

I am

couldn't get to 
> blight anyways since Blight would be in the ocean inside a base 
right now. 
> Yay.
